entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
